name: DiceLess
description:
We recommend playing the windows build for the best experience, but if you don't like downloading games you can try the WebGL build.

Game:

You play as a dice and need to match the number of the other dice in the ground. You match it by moving the dice with W, A, S, D or arrow keys. 

The team:

Xriva  - Programmer and Artist.

3Iias - Programmer.
